import sys

n = int(input())
s = input()

count = 1
for i in range(n-1):
    if s[i] != s[i+1]:
        count += 1

print(count)

N = int(input())
S = input()

count = 1
for i in range(1, N):
    if S[i - 1] != S[i]:
        count += 1

print(count)

    if s[i] != s[i-1]:
        count += 1

print(count)
